title: Custom rest end point is not called at all
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour

I am not so sure but I will describe in details what is happening here. 

I have two EC2 machines (Both Ubuntu). 

In one I am running doccano (I have started it using the vanilla docker command - `docker pull doccano/doccano` which probably means I have pulled the latest)

Then I uploaded some data. And did a bit of annotation. 

After that I have trained a model based on that annotated data and then hosted the model in the second EC2 instance and created a very simple API using FastAPI on top of it. 

That api is accessible from my local.

That API is accessible **when I am setting up auto labelling** 
![Screenshot from 2022-12-06 22-19-50](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5349112/205972790-f5c38632-54db-4ae7-82d3-16244d4f2eb2.png)

And the rest of the steps to set up auto labelling works perfectly fine

mapping step
![Screenshot from 2022-12-06 22-21-51](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5349112/205973184-0486ac71-3aee-4020-8484-4a6a7d6a8b17.png)

final step

![Screenshot from 2022-12-06 22-23-13](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5349112/205973539-96f643d9-aefc-4e8d-aa0e-61dc6e4226e8.png)

After all this it looks like this - 

![Screenshot from 2022-12-06 22-24-47](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5349112/205973895-7e6ff8bd-5a50-42a8-8a96-488d6500d895.png)

As far as I understood from the official tutorial and the thread [here](https://github.com/doccano/doccano/issues/1417) this should be all I need to do.

However once all these are done, the most strange thing starts to happen. I go to the datasets and open one document. And the click on the magic wand. It shows that it is switched off. I slide it on. And ...

NOTHING HAPPENS!! 

I checked the model server log and as well and doccano server log. NO  ACTIVITY. 

So it is like this - 

![Screenshot from 2022-12-06 22-30-02](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5349112/205975188-3c4aa9c0-c583-447e-bab1-005b3eb5db6c.png)

And no labels show.

I switch it on

And no labels show.

No log in server both doccano and the model one.

HOWEVER,

When I was setting this up and I tested the result I did see the log in the server, meaning doccano could actually communicate successfully. 

I have checked the chrome developer window. I see nothing (I am using Brave).

What is going wrong here? What am I missing?

---------
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

<!-- Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System: Ubuntu 20.04
*   Python Version Used: I am not sure whatever comes with the default docker image
*   When you install doccano: I installed it 8 weeks ago
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): Using docker.
